Package com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    This class listens for RUN_AUDIO events on the Eventbroker and plays them using TextToSpeech.
    Constants
    Class containing public static final constants used throughout the application.
    Constants.Cities
    All cities the app supports.
    Constants.CityBoundingBoxes
    Bounding boxes containing Ghent.
    Constants.DynamicRouting
    Constants for dynamic routing
    Constants.Location
    Constants for location updates
    Constants.RouteGenerator
    Constants used for route generation.
    HeartRateSensor
    Created by Stiaan on 5/03/2017.
    RunningMapLocationSource
    Custom location source for the Google Maps Normally they start their own location provider but this is not wanted for two reasons: 1.
    TrackRequest
    This class is used to associate a track request with a request number.
    TrackResponse
    This class is used to associate a track response with a response number.
    WearActivity
    Created by Stiaan on 7/03/2017.
    WearComm
    Created by Stiaan on 7/03/2017.
